Definetly the best game ive played in a long time. The single player narritive is intriging and clever and the added co op feature brings even more to the table. This game is perfect and cheap! It is 1.70 CAD on the steam store right now so pick it up before the winter sale ends.

Best game to ever exist

Excellent !!! Ce jeu fait partie de mon top de jeu. Rapide Avis :
-Excellentissime humour et écriture
-Salles de tests toutes différentes, pas trop compliqué mais juste de difficulté parfaitement dosée
-2 Nouveaux personnages principaux 
-Durée de vie raisonnable (~9h de jeu solo + ~5h coop). 
Et plus d'un millier de salles de tests de la communauté, qui peuvent être excellentes comme pourri xP
-Un éditeur de niveau et plein de bonus...

Je recommande

It's a great puzzle game that plays with physics, a little bit of sci-fi, and a certain test-obsessed robot. (Glados is one of my favorite parts of this game!) If you want to play with friends, or be alone, they're BOTH tied to a story. Singleplayer has the story more prominent, (considering it's literally controlling the ENTIRE playthrough.) while Multiplayer doesn't have this story as prominent, there are still bits of it sprinkled throughout it. (that was worded very weirdly, but I don't know how else to put it. You'll see what I mean if you play the game, lol.) Multiplayer does actually take place AFTER the events of the singleplayer, which I LOVE! I think that's all I have to say. (Omg this literally turned from a summary to a review. What the heck).
x

Oyunu daha önce de crack olarak oynayıp bitirmişliğim var ve yapımcı firma (Valve) işini gayet iyi yaptığı için maddi olarak destek olmak istedim. Zaten çok bir şey değildi. Size önerim şudur ki kesin alın. Senaryo modundan tut coop moduna kadar gayet eğlenceli bir oyun.
益智类的游戏，通关之后还有一堆玩家自制的关卡等你挑战；游戏剧情中的关卡并没那么难，但是有些自制关卡还是有点难度，有时候需要消耗许多脑力才能通关。另外说一下，感觉双人模式更好玩，难度比单人稍高，重点是你和你的伙伴要有默契，喜欢这种思考解密的过程。
